name: Sub-Species
description:
Sub-Species has been Greenlite thanks to everyone that voted for us

Thanks to all of you who supported us at Howlinghamster and voted for our game!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

In Sub-Species you are the pilot of a mini sub, a salvager and scavenger, and the last hope for the world. You must venture into the deepest trenches of our oceans and blast your way past some seriously nasty monsters to recover fragments of the meteor that is spawning these alien creatures

.
The monsters come at you from all angles so you must spin your craft around 360° to engage in combat. You will need to scavenge supplies and weapons for your sub from the sunken wrecks that litter the ocean floor. Upgrades to the sub are not about advancing to having a super sub but rather about keep your sub going.

Demo Features

  • 2.5D 360° shooter action blasting all kinds of nasty monsters.
  • Navigate your submarine through the deepest and most treacherous trenches in the ocean
  • Challenging tactical puzzles as you must work out the best routes to take or overcome daunting obstacles put in your way.

Upcoming Features

  • Side scrolling platformer levels as you explore sunken wrecks to scavenge supplies.
  • Upgrade and repair your submarine at trading posts between levels.
